spec_data.Name: php-jeremeamia-superclosure
spec_data.Description:
Even though serializing closures is "not allowed" by PHP,
the SuperClosure library makes it possible

To use this library, you just have to add, in your project:
  require-once '/usr/share/php/SuperClosure/autoload.php';
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 08:17:12 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Serialize Closure objects, including their context and binding
